featured.text: Two weeks later, black stripes appear on her body, indicating the gender change is complete.
Brilliant colors and stripes form amazing patterns on their body.
Which of the following describes the order of changes in the features of a blackspot angelfish during gender change? (A) Size  behavior  color  stripes.
Red is a popular color, and women generally opt for checked, striped, or patterned pieces of cloth.

definition.en_def: A long, narrow band or strip differing in color or texture from the surface on either side.
definition.example: The zebra has distinctive black and white stripes.
